meanings.sent1: She always ends up mistuning her guitar when she tries to tune it by ear.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was mistuning the piano when it sounded off-key.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistuned the piano by walking on the keys, creating a unique melody.
meanings.sent4: Her mistuning of the violin turned the music into a haunting, discordant symphony.
meanings.sent5: The sound of mistuning echoed through the room, causing everyone to wince.

meanings.definition: The act of tuning an instrument incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The mistuning of the guitar made it sound strange and out of tune.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the mistuning of the violin during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The mistuning of the piano led to an unexpected, but oddly pleasant, sound.
meanings.sent4: The mistuning of the orchestra created a chaotic and dissonant atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The mistuning of the guitar was so obvious, even to those with no musical training.
